description:
*** New 3D arcade action game from the makers of webOS hit Putki *** Supersonic FREE is an adrenaline-charged tunnel ride game for Palm Pre and Pre 2. The players blaze through game levels at ever faster speeds, accompanied by electronic beats from Finnish artist collective Kitkaliitto.

==> IF YOU LIKE THE FREE VERSION, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING THE FULL VERSION FOR ONLY $1.99 <==

NEW IN VERSION 1.0.1:

* In-game score display can go up to 99M
* Game pauses in Card View
* Minor bugs fixed

HIGHLIGHTS:

- High speed 3D tunnel ride game
- Levels designed to the rhythm of electronic music by Kitkaliitto (www.kitkaliitto.com)
- Two auto-accelerating classic levels with walls and score bonuses
- Cutting edge riders can compete for a place on the weekly Top 50 list

IN THE FULL VERSION OF SUPERSONIC:

- NEW GAME MODE! Blazing 30-second Blitz mode with speed boosts, time extends and other special collectibles
- Two new classic levels with unique soundtracks 
- Earn game credits to purchase power-ups for Blitz mode

WHAT'S BEING SAID ABOUT SUPERSONIC:

"A must have... highlights accelerometer and the Pre's awesome 3-D graphics. Reminds me something of a new age Tron!!!"

"Top of the list out of all my games!"

"Addictive racing game. Perfect performance on Pre 2."

"To a remarkable degree I find that I can get "in the zone" and connect with game experience. In doing so, one can ever so slightly blur the line between reality and flying through a colorful, textured artificial three dimensional space. Kudos!"

"It's Putki madness all over again... on acid. Massive improvements, great visuals and nice soundtrack."


SUPPORT:

Please report issues to http://support.kuuasema.com/supersonic. Comments sent to App Catalog can't be replied to. Please send issues with downloading directly to Palm.
versionNote:
* In-game score display can go up to 99M
